hero.title: A ride takes a minute. The trust is infinite.
hero.subtitle: FixDrive connects you with verified drivers on fixed schedules — reliability, safety and comfort for everyday life.
hero.availability_ribbon: Available in select cities • Pilot programs and corporate partnerships

about.title: About FixDrive
about.description: FixDrive — by Axivion LLC — is a personal driver subscription service. We connect families and busy professionals with assigned drivers who work on fixed schedules. No surprises. Just reliable rides.

features.reliability_core_body: FixDrive is built to simplify your life with features that put predictability and safety first.

bullets.fixed_drivers_desc: The same verified driver for recurring trips.
bullets.schedule_first_desc: Plan once — ride every day: school, work, errands.
bullets.transparent_pricing_desc: Clear subscription tiers and lower per-ride fees for subscribers.
bullets.safety_verification_desc: Background checks, insurance, and rating system.

drivers_points.stable_income: Stable income — regular clients, predictable schedule.

demo.title: See FixDrive in Action
demo.subtitle: A quick 45-second overview of how easy it is to get started.

reviews.title: Trusted by Families and Professionals
reviews.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what our customers are saying.

sarah.name: Sarah L.
sarah.text: FixDrive has been a lifesaver for school runs. Our driver, David, is always on time and the kids love him. It's one less thing to worry about!

mark.name: Mark C.
mark.text: My daily commute is now my most productive time. No more stress about traffic or parking. The subscription model is transparent and worth every penny.

corporate.name: HR Manager, Innovate Inc.
corporate.text: FixDrive piloted with our team — punctuality improved across the board. It's a fantastic perk for our employees, and the corporate invoicing is seamless.

points.peace_of_mind: Peace of mind: verified drivers & insurance
points.convenience: Convenience: multi-stop rides and schedule sync

footer.tagline: Reliability, safety and comfort for your daily life.
footer.copyright: FixDrive — by Axivion LLC. All rights reserved.

meta.all_packages_include: All packages include access to secure rides and Family profiles.

about.meta_description: Learn about FixDrive's mission to revolutionize transportation with reliable, safe, and comfortable ride-sharing services.
about.hero_subtitle: Revolutionizing transportation with reliable, safe, and comfortable ride-sharing services
about.story_p1: FixDrive was born from a simple observation: traditional ride-sharing services often lack the reliability and personal touch that commuters need for their daily journeys. We saw an opportunity to create something different—a service that connects people with trusted drivers on a fixed schedule.
about.story_p2: Founded by Axivion LLC, we believe that transportation should be predictable, safe, and comfortable. Our platform bridges the gap between the convenience of ride-sharing and the reliability of traditional transportation services.
about.story_p3: Today, we're proud to serve select cities with our pilot programs and corporate partnerships, building a community of drivers and riders who value consistency and quality in their daily commutes.

values.safety_desc: Every ride is designed with safety as our top priority, ensuring peace of mind for both drivers and riders.
values.reliability_desc: We provide consistent, on-time service that you can count on for your daily transportation needs.
values.community_desc: Building connections between drivers and riders, creating a supportive transportation community.
values.innovation_desc: Leveraging technology to improve transportation experiences and make cities more connected.
values.trust_desc: Fostering trust through transparent practices and verified driver partnerships.
values.excellence_desc: Committed to delivering exceptional service quality in every interaction and ride.

about.axivion_p1: FixDrive is developed and operated by Axivion LLC, a technology company dedicated to creating innovative solutions that improve how people move through their cities.
about.axivion_p2: Our team combines expertise in transportation, technology, and user experience to deliver a service that truly meets the needs of modern commuters.
about.cta_subtitle: Join our community of drivers and riders who value reliability, safety, and comfort.

mission.meta_description: Discover FixDrive's mission to revolutionize transportation and our vision for a more connected, reliable future.
mission.hero_subtitle: Our commitment to transforming transportation for a better tomorrow
mission.mission_quote: To revolutionize urban transportation by connecting people with trusted drivers on fixed schedules, ensuring reliability, safety, and comfort in every journey.

points.networks: Create reliable transportation networks in select cities
points.connect: Connect verified drivers with regular commuters
points.community: Build communities based on trust and consistency
points.safety_ux: Focus on safety and user experience

mission.vision_quote: To create a world where transportation is seamless, predictable, and accessible to everyone, building stronger communities through reliable connections.

vision.global_desc: Expanding our reliable transportation network to cities worldwide, making quality transportation accessible everywhere.
vision.community_desc: Fostering connections between drivers and riders, creating lasting relationships and stronger local communities.
vision.innovation_desc: Continuously improving our technology and services to provide the best possible transportation experience.

drivers.predictable_income_desc: Fixed schedules mean reliable earnings and better work-life balance.
drivers.regular_customers_desc: Build relationships with regular riders who value your service.
drivers.community_support_desc: Join a network of professional drivers who support each other.

riders.reliable_service_desc: Never worry about being late - your driver will be there on time.
riders.familiar_faces_desc: Get to know your regular drivers and build trust over time.
riders.comfort_safety_desc: Travel with confidence knowing your safety is our priority.

mission.cta_subtitle: Be part of the transportation revolution. Whether you're a driver or rider, help us build a more connected future.

privacy.meta_description: FixDrive's Privacy Policy - Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
privacy.hero_subtitle: Your privacy and data protection are our top priorities
privacy.intro_p1: At FixDrive, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our transportation services.
privacy.intro_p2: By using FixDrive, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. If you do not agree with our policies and practices, please do not use our services.
privacy.service_provision_desc: To provide, maintain, and improve our transportation services, including matching you with drivers and processing payments.
privacy.communication_desc: To send you important updates about your trips, service changes, and respond to your inquiries and support requests.
privacy.safety_security_desc: To ensure the safety of our platform, verify user identities, and prevent fraud or misuse of our services.
privacy.analytics_desc: To analyze usage patterns, improve our services, and develop new features that better serve our community.
privacy.legal_compliance_desc: To comply with applicable laws, regulations, and legal processes, and to protect our rights and interests.
your_rights_items: Access and review your personal data
Request deletion of your account and data
privacy.questions_subtitle: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us.

terms.meta_description: FixDrive's Terms of Use - Read our terms and conditions for using our transportation services.
terms.hero_subtitle: Terms and conditions for using FixDrive services
terms.intro_p1: Welcome to FixDrive! These Terms of Use ("Terms") govern your use of our transportation services, mobile application, and website (collectively, the "Service") operated by Axivion LLC ("us", "we", or "our").
terms.intro_p2: By accessing or using our Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of these terms, then you may not access the Service.
service_usage_items: Use service for lawful purposes only
terms.acceptance_content: By creating an account or using our Service, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms. These Terms apply to all users of the Service, including riders and drivers.
terms.service_description_content: FixDrive provides a platform that connects riders with drivers for transportation services. We facilitate the connection but are not a transportation provider. Drivers are independent contractors, not employees of FixDrive.
terms.user_accounts_content: You must provide accurate and complete information when creating an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.
terms.payment_terms_content: Payment for services is processed through our secure payment system. All fees are non-refundable unless otherwise specified. We reserve the right to change our pricing with reasonable notice.
terms.prohibited_uses_content: You may not use our Service for any unlawful purpose or to solicit others to perform unlawful acts. Prohibited activities include harassment, fraud, illegal transportation of goods, or any activity that violates applicable laws.
terms.limitation_liability_content: FixDrive's liability is limited to the maximum extent permitted by law. We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from your use of the Service.
terms.termination_content: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms or is harmful to other users, us, or third parties.
terms.changes_terms_content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes via email or through the Service. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.
safety_first_items: Always verify driver identity before entering vehicle
Share trip details with trusted contacts
Follow all applicable traffic and safety laws
legal_compliance_items: These Terms are governed by applicable local laws
Disputes will be resolved through binding arbitration
Users must comply with all applicable regulations
Service availability may vary by location
terms.questions_subtitle: If you have any questions about these Terms of Use, please contact us for clarification.
